original_text: Now while he was not yet gone back, he said, Go back also to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan, whom the king of Babylon hath made governor over the cities of Judah, and dwell with him among the people: or go wheresoever it seemeth convenient unto thee to go. So the captain of the guard gave him victuals and a reward, and let him go.
korean_text: 예레미야가 아직 돌이키기 전에 그가 다시 이르되 너는 바벨론의 왕이 유다 성읍들을 맡도록 세운 사반의 손자 아히감의 아들 그다랴에게로 돌아가서 그와 함께 백성 가운데 살거나 네가 옳게 여기는 곳으로 가거나 할지니라 하고 그 사령관이 그에게 양식과 선물을 주어 보내매

sentences.original_text: Now while he was not yet gone back
the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan
whom the king of Babylon hath made governor
and dwell with him among the people
or go wheresoever it seemeth convenient unto thee to go
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 네가 가기에 편하다고 여기는 곳 어디든지 가라

sentences.original_text: So the captain of the guard
gave him victuals and a reward
